食管裂孔疝(hiatus hernia)是指腹腔内脏器(主要是胃)通过膈食管裂孔进入胸腔所致的疾病。食管裂孔疝是膈疝中最常见者，达90%以上。

entry.def: A hernia is a medical condition which is often caused by strain or injury. It results in one of your internal organs sticking through a weak point in the surrounding tissue.
